title: White bread
description: This bread is adaptable – shape it into loaves or roll, scatter poppy or sesame seeds over the top or just leave it plain. Whatever you choose, you won’t be disappointed.
ingredients: 2½ tsp dried yeast, or 20g/¾oz fresh yeast
750g/1lb 9oz strong bread flour, plus extra for dusting
poppy or sesame seeds, for the top of the loaf (optional)
